historyTrigger.title: History trigger
historyTrigger.description: Trigger for HISTORY event (History uplink sent every history trigger * temperature measurement rate)

tempThreshold.title: Temperature threshold
tempThreshold.description: Temperature threshold for ALARMING Event (Alarming uplink sent every Temp Meas Rate if temp difference > threshold), where 0 means ALARMING always ON (Alarming sent every Meas Rate)

tempOffset.title: Temperature offset
tempOffset.description: Temperature offset used when calculating actual temperature with the PT100 sensor
